mapper.select: SELECT Reserve_history.*, department.dept_name, ROUND(Reserve_history.RESERVE_PRICE/tmp.emp_sum*COMPETENT_DEPARTMENT.EMP_COUNT, -1) AS cost FROM RESERVE_HISTORY, EMPLOYEE, department, ROOM, COMPETENT_DEPARTMENT ,(SELECT reserve_no, SUM(emp_count) as emp_sum FROM competent_department GROUP BY reserve_no) tmp WHERE reserve_history.reserve_emp_no=employee.emp_no AND competent_department.dept_no = department.dept_no AND reserve_history.room_no = room.room_no AND reserve_history.reserve_no = competent_department.reserve_no AND reserve_history.reserve_no = tmp.reserve_no AND reserve_history.approval2_yn = 1 AND room.mgr_emp_no = #{empNo} ORDER BY Reserve_history.RESERVE_NO

SELECT Reserve_history.*, department.dept_name, ROUND(Reserve_history.RESERVE_PRICE/tmp.emp_sum*COMPETENT_DEPARTMENT.EMP_COUNT,-1) AS cost FROM RESERVE_HISTORY, EMPLOYEE, department, ROOM, COMPETENT_DEPARTMENT ,(SELECT reserve_no, SUM(emp_count) as emp_sum FROM competent_department GROUP BY reserve_no) tmp WHERE reserve_history.reserve_emp_no=employee.emp_no AND competent_department.dept_no = department.dept_no AND reserve_history.room_no = room.room_no AND reserve_history.reserve_no = competent_department.reserve_no AND reserve_history.reserve_no = tmp.reserve_no AND reserve_history.approval2_yn = 1 AND department.boss_no = #{empNo} ORDER BY Reserve_history.RESERVE_NO
